channel.title: Missing hal.dl
channel.description:
Hello,when I start up my Laptop it says missing hal.dll and it says insert it to get it back or something like that.
So how can i get Hal.Dll

item.title: Missing hal.dl
item.dc:creator: @T41 t4
item.description:
@T41 wrote:

[quote=“BlazezFire, post:6, topic:280441”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=370435.msg2800088#msg2800088 date=1243328141]
This is not Computer Hardware Disscusion…

If you dont have a Windows CD:
I Personally would stick a live CD into your laptop and download the file from here mount your hardrive and manualy add the file to system32.

BlazezFire, I got that Link from www.google.com so dont deny its power.
[/quote]
I used my Windows disk to repair my system but once I pick the C: drive it says what is the Administrator password but I never put a password on my Computer at all.[/quote]
That means the password is blank.

Read full topic

item.title: Missing hal.dl
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

You can just stick the install disk in, and hit repair.

Read full topic

Windows XP?, had the same problem self, best way is to reinstall windows.

item.title: Missing hal.dl
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

Lots of ways to fix this here: http://pcsupport.about.com/od/findbyerrormessage/a/missinghaldll.htm

imjohn10 was not spamming, I just googled “missing hal.dll” and got a lot of different sites.

Read full topic
